item.title: Cash bag [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Try this.

All SERVER SIDED.

Add this into your actionhandler class.

case ####: if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,2147000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995,c.getItems().getItemSlot(995), 2147000000); c.getItems().deleteItem(####,c.getItems().getItemSlot(####), 1); c.getItems().addItem(####, 1) } else { c.sendMessage("You need the maximum amount of coins to fill this bag!"); break; } case ####: c.getItems().deleteItem(####,c.getItems().getItemSlot(####), 1); c.getItems().addItem(995, 2147000000); break;

I’m sure you can figure it out from there.

Post here if you get any errors, I just whipped that up real quick.

Read full topic
